translation: Verily, Thou Thyself knowest Thyself by Thyself, O Supreme Person, O source and Lord of all beings, O God of gods, O ruler of the world!
commentary: 10.15 Thyself? Eve only? Atmana by Thyself? Thyself? Vettha (Thou) knowest? You Thou? Purushottam Or Supreme Person? Bhutabhavana O source of beings? Bhootesh O Lord of beings? God of gods O God of,gods? Jagatpate O ruler of the world.Commentary Purushottama means the best among all Purushas. He assumes the four forms? viz.? the source of beings? the Lord of beings? God of gods and ruler of the world.
